DOC.brief_summary: The goal study investigate effect depth neuromuscular block ( NMB ) global regional ( dependent versus nondependent ) respiratory mechanic laparoscopic surgery . Furthermore , investigate level NMB influence intraoperative hemodynamic cerebral oxygenation .
DOC.brief_title: Hemodynamic Respiratory Variations During Laparoscopic Surgery With Without Deep Neuromuscular Blockade .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year older Elective patient schedule undergo laparoscopic surgery expect duration > 2h Physical status ASA I III Pregnancy Severe cardiac disease ( NYHA class III IV , acute coronary syndrome , persistent ventricular tachyarrhythmia ) Previous lung surgery History severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease Gastroesophageal pathology ( include limit recent gastric esophageal surgery include bypass/banding , history esophageal varix , know anatomical gastric esophageal defect stricture , hernias fistula ) Mechanical ventilation within last 30 day Neuromuscular disease Consented another interventional study refusal participate present study Hypersensitivity ( e.g. , anaphylaxis ) rocuronium bromide neuromuscular blocking agent
